name: CLEAR Model
description: The CLEAR Model, developed by Peter Hawkins, emphasizes building trust, exploring the client's world, identifying actions, and reviewing progress. It is widely used for performance and leadership coaching.

session_objectives.title: What do we want to achieve from this session?
session_objectives.description: Define clear objectives for the coaching session

session_value.title: What would make this valuable?
session_value.description: Identify what would make this session valuable for the client

current_situation.title: What is happening for you right now?
current_situation.description: Listen to the client's current situation and context

feelings_about_situation.title: How do you feel about this situation?
feelings_about_situation.description: Explore the client's emotional response to their situation

action_steps.title: What steps will you take?
action_steps.description: Define specific action steps to move forward

implementation_plan.title: How will you implement them?
implementation_plan.description: Create a plan for implementing the chosen actions

key_learnings.title: What have you learned?
key_learnings.description: Reflect on key insights and learnings from the session

future_application.title: What will you take forward into future sessions?
future_application.description: Identify what to carry forward into future coaching sessions
